actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require payment for prescription drug benefits as part of required medicare cost-sharing for qualified medicare beneficiaries.
short_title: Medicare Buy-In Prescription Drug Coverage Act of 1990

summary.text: Medicare Buy-In Prescription Drug Coverage Act of 1990 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to require that State Medicaid plans provide the same prescription drug coverage to Medicare (title XVIII of the Act) beneficiaries whose income is below the Federal poverty level as they provide to Medicaid beneficiaries.

titles.title: Medicare Buy-In Prescription Drug Coverage Act of 1990
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require payment for prescription drug benefits as part of required medicare cost-sharing for qualified medicare beneficiaries.
